name: PDFActionNamed
desc: PDFActionNamed defines methods used to work with actions in PDF documents, some of which are named in the Adobe PDF Specification.

items.name: var name: PDFActionNamedName
items.desc: Returns the name of the named action.

items.name: init(name: PDFActionNamedName)
items.desc: Initializes the PDFActionName object with the specified named action.
